snippet: Lawyers for Bernice King, the daughter of the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., squared off Tuesday against lawyers for Dr. King’s estate in an effort to resolve the disputed ownership of the slain civil rights leader’s Bible and Nobel Prize.
abstract: Bernice King's lawyers square off against lawyers for estate of her father, Rev Dr Martin Luther King, as they try to resolve disputed ownership of King's Bible and Noble Prize.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Bernice King, the daughter of the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., squared off Tuesday against lawyers for Dr. King’s estate in an effort to resolve the disputed ownership of the slain civil rights leader’s Bible and Nobel Prize.

headline.main: Georgia: Fight Over King Legacy Is Closer to Trial
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Fight Over King Legacy Is Closer to Trial
